body.name: Chicco PhysioForma Light Day & Night including Glow In Dark Pacifier for Babies 0-6m, Pink, Orthodontic Nipple, BPA-Free, 2-count in Sterilizing Case
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 51 mins
features: Clinically developed, tested, and approved in partnership with an advisory panel of leading neonatologists, pediatricians, and orthodontists. BPA and Latex Free.
One paci for day and one glow-in-the-dark paci for night
Extra-soft, satin-textured silicone nipple for more comfort and less slip
Double ventilation holes for air circulation help prevent the gathering of saliva
body.description: Finally, a pacifier that soothes babies and parents too! The PhysioForma Light Day & Night Pacifier is a lightweight, orthodontic pacifier with an extra ventilated shield. Double ventilation channels promote air circulation and help reduce moisture buildup on baby’s soft, sensitive skin. The extra-light, airy shield is designed for comfort and breathability for a barely-there feel on baby’s face. For uninterrupted soothing, the nipple is made from extra-soft silicone with a satin-textured finish for more grip and less slip. Accepted by 9 out of 10 babies. The PhysioForma Light Day & Night Orthodontic Pacifier isn’t just for pacifying, it also has physiological breathing and orthodontic benefits. Clinical studies show that PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby’s breathing by positioning the tongue forward to maintain an open airway, which is especially important during sleep. Physiological breathing improves quality of sleep and reduces irritability - better for baby & you. The unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth. Our exclusive nipple design was developed, tested, and approved in partnership with an advisory panel of leading neonatologists, pediatricians, and orthodontists. Each set of Light pacifiers includes one paci for day and one glow-in-the dark paci for night. Available in three sizes: 0-6m, 6-16m, and 16-24m. Reusable, sterilizing/carry case included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Perfect Fit for baby's comfort The Light Day & Night paci has an extra-light, ergonomic shield for a barely there feel on baby's face. A contoured shield with ventilation holes for air circulation fits baby's little features & helps reduce moisture buildup. Plus, an extra-soft nipple helps baby stay latched - for more comfort & less slip! Exclusive Nipple Design for baby's breathing Clinical studies show PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby's breathing. Our exclusive nipple (developed, tested & approved in partnership with an advisory panel of neonatologists, pediatricians & orthodontists) helps position baby's tongue forward to maintain an open airway. Orthodontic Shape for baby’s oral development The unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth! Two Great Options one for day, one for night Pack includes a lightweight pacifier for daytime and an easy to find glow-in-the-dark pacifier for night time. The glow-in-the dark knob can easily be reactivated by leaving pacifier exposed to light (either natural or artificial). Included Sterilizing Case for cleanliness In addition to being handy storage for baby's pacis, you can also use the included case to eliminate germs quickly and easily with the power of steam. Our sterilizing case lets you sanitize pacifiers in the microwave in just 3 minutes! Loved by Babies and Parents don't just take our word for it Parents voted and they endorse PhysioForma! Our Light Day & Night Orthodontic Pacifiers received the prestigious Parent Tested, Parent Approved Seal of Approval in 2019 and 2020.

Accessorize your PhysioForma Chicco Pocket Buddies Soft loveys make the perfect snuggle buddies and keep baby's paci close by. Attach pacifier to hand, tail or store it in the roomy belly pocket. Chicco Pacifier Clips Fashionable clips keep baby's pacis clean and within reach. Universal clips attach any style pacifier to baby's clothing, diaper bags, purses & more. Chicco Paci-Roo Storage Case Handy storage/travel case keeps pacis clean at home & on-the-go. Secure zipper & velcro strap for attaching to diaper bags, purses, strollers & more! Choose Your Favorite Buddy Chicco Pocket Buddies are available in 4 friends: Bunny, Elephant, Fox & Bear. Perfect for the paci stage & beyond. Long lasting. Machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got exactly what I expected. They’re super cute and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light with great nipple shape
reviews.reviewText: I have had the hardest time finding a pacifier my 4 month old will take. The biggest problem is they are all almost to heavy and they often just fall out of his mouth. These solve that issue, they are very light and I really like the nipple shape on these. My kids hated the straight nipples and always preferred a shape like these.I didn't realize the one was glow in the dark either, which is just awesome when it's midnight and you're trying to find the pacifier that fell out!Also love that these don't have a ring on the back which means little fingers are way less likely to get caught on the pacifier and pulled out, which happens way too often.So glad I tried these out - Will definitely get more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the air holes. I can actually keep these!
reviews.reviewText: So I saw a review on another product for the potential of mold growing inside the pacifier because of the water going into the back of the pacifier. With these they completely air out because of the hole in the nipple part. Not really helping as far as helping my daughter to breathe... She's 2, but it definitely is a win for me because I don't fear about mold as these can completely air out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have twin girls and they love having their “binkies” sometimes at night. They will be 5 in August so I was worried if these pacifiers would work. Needless to say, they both had them in when we turned off the lights, and within 5 minutes, they both had dropped them from their mouths because they quickly fell asleep!Great products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay but seem a little flimsy and small
reviews.reviewText: My daughter so far doesn't like them. they seem kinda small for age rating and the part they suck on doesn't seem very durable. We've been using advent but was looking for an alternative that might be better ortho wise. Also ordered MAM. haven't tried with her yet but they are a lot bigger and thicker which if your little one is teething I'd probably be more comfortable with going with MAM brand. That's what we used for our first and never needed to switch to anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same nipple as the 100% silicone version without the pesky ring
reviews.reviewText: My baby likes the clear 100% silicone Chicco pacifier, so I got these when she discovered she could pull it out and toss it across the crib (or room) in her sleep. The glow-in-the-dark one is much easier to find in the middle of the night, and I like that it doesn't have a ring for baby to grasp. I might keep the non-glow-in-the-dark pacifier in the diaper bag for those long, sleepy car rides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but doesn’t glow long.
reviews.reviewText: Our baby seems to like these pacifiers. She only will keep these and the Nuk ones in her mouth. The glow in the dark one however doesn’t glow unless you “charge” by holding it over a light for a bit and even then it doesn’t glow for long. It’s cute tho and she likes them so I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I grew up with Chicco and after becoming a momSome years ago and now again, my love for Chicco continues. I love their pacifiers. I just wish they were still the older model. These seem to leave a mark in my baby’s cheeks every time, but nonetheless, I love them.
mi bb usa chupones chicco hace más de un año, se que es controversial eluso de chupones, pero al ser anatómicos y evitar que mi bebé se chupe el pulgar, aprobados por sus pediatras :)
Son los únicos que no le producen gases al bebé así que magníficos para nosotros
